MeasureCounter - macOS Installation
====================================

CONTENTS:
- MeasureCounter.vst3 (Universal: Apple Silicon + Intel)
- MeasureCounter.component (Audio Unit - Universal)

INSTALLATION:

1. Copy the files to your plugin directories:

   VST3:
   cp -r MeasureCounter.vst3 ~/Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/VST3/

   Audio Unit:
   cp -r MeasureCounter.component ~/Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/Components/

2. Clear the Audio Unit cache (recommended):
   killall -9 AudioComponentRegistrar
   rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/AudioUnitCache

3. Restart your DAW or rescan plugins

FIRST LAUNCH:
macOS Gatekeeper will block unsigned plugins. To allow:
- Right-click on the plugin in Finder
- Select "Open"
- Click "Open" in the dialog
- Subsequent launches work normally

SUPPORTED DAWS:
- Logic Pro
- Ableton Live
- Reaper
- Pro Tools
- FL Studio
- And any DAW supporting VST3 or AU
